description.narrative: National Staff Cost, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 10: Operational support is efficient, effective and risk informed to enable the Country Programme achieve results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2021, HR Management focused on people-centered and innovative management with the automation of certain processes that led to improved HR services, faster recruitment and offered constant analytics for an informed decisions. HR contributed to structuring reviews for an increased and agile YCO workforce to respond to the emergencies | Status:On-track | As-of Date:02/02/2022
